app.title: What Even With My Hot Self?!

settings.title: Settings
settings.reportTimes.title: Report Times
settings.reportTimes.subtitle: Set your preferred cutoff times for morning and evening reports.
settings.reportTimes.note: These times affect when your morning and evening reports are available and when reminders are sent.
settings.reportTimes.updated.title: Report Time Updated
settings.notifications.title: Notification Preferences
settings.notifications.subtitle: Choose which reminders you want to receive and set the time for each notification.
settings.notifications.note: Reminders will be sent at the selected time for each report, regardless of the report cutoff times above.
settings.notifications.timeUpdated.title: Notification Time Updated
settings.customize.title: Customize Tracking Items
settings.customize.subtitle: Choose which items appear in your Morning, Evening, and Quick reports.
settings.actions.title: Configuration Actions
settings.actions.export.mobile.title: Configuration copied!
settings.actions.export.mobile.message: Your config has been copied to clipboard. Paste it into a text file to save it.
settings.actions.export.desktop.title: Configuration exported
settings.actions.export.desktop.message: Your configuration has been exported successfully.
settings.updateConfig.title: Update View Configuration
settings.updateConfig.subtitle: Force update the view configuration with the latest items and settings.
settings.updateConfig.success.title: Configuration Updated
settings.updateConfig.success.message: View configuration has been updated with new items!
settings.updateConfig.error.title: Update Failed
settings.fixConfig.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Fix Configuration Issues
settings.fixConfig.subtitle: If you're experiencing configuration errors, this will clear the corrupted configuration and start fresh.
settings.fixConfig.confirm: This will clear your current configuration and start fresh. Are you sure?
settings.fixConfig.success.title: Configuration Cleared
settings.fixConfig.success.message: Configuration has been cleared and recreated successfully!
settings.fixConfig.error.title: Clear Failed
settings.trackingItems.updated.title: Updated
toast.signOut.success.title: Signed out
toast.signOut.success.message: You have been successfully signed out.
toast.signOut.error.title: Sign out failed
toast.signOut.error.message: There was an error signing out. Please try again.
toast.config.cleared.title: Configuration cleared
toast.config.cleared.message: Your configuration has been reset to defaults.
toast.config.clearFailed.title: Clear failed
toast.config.clearFailed.message: Failed to clear configuration. Please try again.
toast.config.exported.title: Configuration exported
toast.config.exported.message: Your configuration has been exported successfully.
toast.config.exportFailed.title: Export failed
toast.config.exportFailed.message: Failed to export configuration. Please try again.
toast.config.imported.title: Configuration imported
toast.config.imported.message: Your configuration has been imported successfully.
dashboard.viewDesc.morning: Start your day with some assessments
dashboard.viewDesc.evening: End your day with reflection and sentiment
dashboard.viewDesc.quick: Add single entries throughout the day
dashboard.import.title: Import Configuration
dashboard.import.helpText: Select a JSON or LZJSON file containing configuration data to import. This will replace your current configuration.
dashboard.import.error.title: Import Error
dashboard.import.error.hint: Please check that your file is a valid configuration export from this application.
dashboard.import.success.heading: Import Successful
dashboard.import.warning.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Warning:
dashboard.import.warning.backup.title: Backup First:
dashboard.import.warning.backup.text: Export your current configuration before importing
dashboard.import.warning.replacement.tex: Imported configuration will replace your current settings
dashboard.import.warning.validation.text: Invalid configuration files will be rejected
dashboard.reset.title: Reset Configuration
dashboard.reset.confirmText: This will reset your configuration to default values. This action cannot be undone.
dashboard.reset.confirmHint: Consider exporting your current configuration first if you want to save it.
dashboard.reset.detail.fields: All custom tracking fields and categories
logs.title: üìù Tracking Logs
logs.subtitle: Review and manage your historical tracking data

logs.export.button.title: Export tracking data for backup or analysis

logs.toast.generate.success.message: Generated {entries} entries across {months} months for testing date ranges.
logs.toast.delete.success.title: Entry deleted
logs.toast.delete.success.message: Entry has been moved to trash. You can restore it later.

logs.toast.delete.error.message: Failed to delete entry. Please try again.
logs.toast.restore.success.title: Entry restored
logs.toast.restore.error.title: Restore failed

logs.toast.export.success.title: Export successful
logs.toast.export.error.title: Export failed
logs.toast.export.error.message: Failed to export data. Please try again.
logs.toast.import.success.title: Import successful
logs.import.error.fallback: Failed to import data. Please check the file format.
logs.empty.title: No entries found
logs.empty.subtitle: Try adjusting your filters or date range to see more entries.
quick.empty.title: No quick track items configured.
quick.empty.subtitle: Go to Settings to configure your quick track items.

insights.trend.title: {item} Trend Analysis
insights.empty.title: No Data Available
insights.empty.subtitle: Start tracking your {item} to see insights and trends.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we protect your privacy and handle your data
privacy.lastUpdated.label: Last updated:
privacy.lastUpdated.scope: This privacy policy applies to all users of 'What Even With My Hot Self?!' regardless of how you access the application.
reauth.title: Please sign in again
reauth.message: To keep your Google Drive connection active, sign in again. Your data is safe and offline entries will sync after re-auth.
reauth.dismiss.title: Hide this message for now
reauth.dismiss.label: Dismiss
sw.updateAvailable.title: App Update Available
sw.updateAvailable.message: A new version is ready. Click to update.
sw.offlineLimited.title: Offline Features Limited
sw.offlineLimited.message: Some offline features may not be available.
notifications.disabled.title: Notifications Disabled
notifications.disabled.message: Please enable notifications in your browser settings.
notifications.enabled.title: Notifications Enabled
notifications.enabled.message: You'll now receive helpful reminders and insights.
error.title: Oops! Something went wrong
error.subtitle: We encountered an unexpected error. Don't worry - your data is safe!
error.nextSteps.title: If this problem persists, please:

pwa.installed.message: Your tracker is now installed and ready to use.
